name: Point of No Return (itch) (rasselbock, Bencer)
description:
The Bell Brothers GMTK Game jam 2022 submission following the theme of "Roll of The Dice"
A top down shooter where you goal is to find and rebuild the monument that protected the city after it was destroyed by a tragic event and get the most points possible.

We wanted to emphasize the 'pushing your luck' aspect of the "Roll of the dice" theme of the game jam. Picking up items and monuments could be a boon or a barrier to gaining points and finding more monument pieces. Discover more dice rolls and save the world in "Point of No Return" by playing it yourself!

This was our first game jam. Our scope was a little larger than we could handle, and we wish we could have spent more time adding ways to push your luck for more points. We wanted to create a feeling of risk vs reward, but where the risk and reward is randomly decided each run.

Would love to hear feedback, and looking forward to next year's game jam!
